price: 14. Such shall be the dwellers of Paradise, abiding therein (forever) - a reward for what they used to do.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati khālidīna fīhā jazāan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
